data.title: December weather
data.meta_description: December weather for Zurich, Montana: February, March and December are months with the least rain in Zurich when the rain falls for 7 days and typically aggregates up to 0.55" (14mm) of rain. February, March and December are months with the least rain in Zurich when the rain falls for 7 days and typically aggregates up to 0.55" (14mm) of rain.
data.text:
Average temperature in December

Zurich, MT

Average high temperature in December: 26.6°F

The warmest month (with the highest average high temperature) is July (82°F).

The month with the lowest average high temperature is February (26.2°F).

Average low temperature in December: 14.9°F

The month with the highest average low temperature is August (60.3°F).

The coldest month (with the lowest average low temperature) is February (12.6°F).

Average rainfall in December

Zurich, MT

Average rainfall in December: 0.55"

The wettest month (with the highest rainfall) is June (1.85").

The driest months (with the least rainfall) are February, March and December (0.55").

Average snowfall in December

Zurich, MT

Average snowfall in December: 3.58"

The month with the highest snowfall is January (4.02").

The months with the least snowfall are June, July and August (0").

Average snowfall days in December

Zurich, MT

Average snowfall days in December: 11.1 days

The month with the highest number of snowfall days is January (12.4 days).

The months with the least snowfall days are June, July and August (0 days).

Average daylight in December /

Average sunshine in December

Zurich, MT

Average daylight in December: 8h and 2min

The month with the longest days is June (Average daylight: 16h and 6min).

The month with the shortest days is December (Average daylight: 8h and 24min).

Average sunshine in December: 5h and 4min

The month with the most sunshine is July (Average sunshine: 12h and 0min).

The month with the least sunshine is February (Average sunshine: 5h and 12min).

Average UV index in December

Zurich, MT

Average UV index in December: 2

The months with the highest UV index are June and July (UV index 6).

The months with the lowest UV index are January, February, March, October, November and December (UV index 2).

Average visibility in December

Zurich, MT

Average visibility in December: 6mi

The months with the highest visibility are January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November and December (6mi).

The months with the lowest visibility are January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November and December (6mi).
